exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros m x y H. unfold eqc in H. simpl in H. destruct m. - contradiction. - destruct H as [H1 | H2]. + rewrite H1. auto. + apply H2. - destruct H as [H1 | [H2 H3]]. + right. split; auto. + left. split; auto.
